abstract: Tennis Roundup; Denisa Allertova defeats Angelique Kerber in second round of BNP Paribas Open at Indian Wells Tennis Garden; other tennis news noted.

headline.print_headline: Kerber Drops Another Indian Wells Opener
headline.main: Angelique Kerber Drops Another Indian Wells Opener

snippet: Kerber lost her opening match at the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., in straight sets, 7-5, 7-5, to Denisa Allertova.
lead_paragraph: Kerber lost her opening match at the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., in straight sets, 7-5, 7-5, to Denisa Allertova.
